analyses.title: Customer Demographics Analysis
analyses.context: Understanding distribution and geographic information of customers.

sub_analyses.title: Customer Distribution by City
sub_analyses.why: To identify the concentration of customers in various cities.
answers: Number of customers in each city

sub_analyses.title: Customer Distribution by State
sub_analyses.why: To understand which states have the highest number of customers.
answers: Number of customers in each state

sub_analyses.title: Customer Geolocation Mapping
sub_analyses.why: To map customers' geographic locations using zip codes.
answers: Geographic coordinates for customer zip codes

analyses.title: Order Analysis
analyses.context: Analyze data regarding the orders placed, their statuses, and timelines.

sub_analyses.title: Order Status Distribution
sub_analyses.why: To examine the distribution of order statuses to assess fulfillment dynamics.

sub_analyses.title: Order Purchase Trends
sub_analyses.why: To understand order volume patterns over time.

sub_analyses.title: Delivery Times vs. Estimated
sub_analyses.why: To identify any discrepancies between estimated and actual delivery times.
answers: Difference between actual and estimated delivery dates

analyses.title: Order Item Analysis
analyses.context: Examine specific items within each order to understand product-level details in transactions.

sub_analyses.title: Average Order Item Price
sub_analyses.why: To calculate the average price per item ordered.

sub_analyses.title: Freight Cost Analysis
sub_analyses.why: To determine the impact of freight costs on order item transactions.
answers: Aggregate freight value for ordered items

sub_analyses.title: Product Popularity by Orders
sub_analyses.why: To assess which products are most frequently ordered.

analyses.title: Payment Analysis
analyses.context: Analyze payment methods and behaviors to understand customer financial behaviors.

sub_analyses.title: Payment Method Distribution
sub_analyses.why: To analyze the preferences for different payment methods.
answers: Proportion of orders by payment type

sub_analyses.title: Installments Analysis
sub_analyses.why: To investigate the prevalence and patterns of installment payments.
answers: Average number of installments per order

analyses.title: Review Analysis
analyses.context: Analyze customer feedback and satisfaction through order reviews.

sub_analyses.title: Review Score Summary
sub_analyses.why: To evaluate overall customer satisfaction trends.

sub_analyses.title: Review Volume Over Time
sub_analyses.why: To monitor the volume of reviews submitted over time, indicating engagement.

analyses.title: Product Analysis
analyses.context: Explore product details to understand inventory characteristics and organization.

sub_analyses.title: Product Category Presence
sub_analyses.why: To summarize the distribution of products across different categories.

sub_analyses.title: Product Dimension Statistics
sub_analyses.why: To gather insights on the physical properties of the inventory, identifying size/weight distribution.
answers: Average dimensions of products (length, width, height)

sub_analyses.title: Translation Check of Product Categories
sub_analyses.why: To ensure product category names are accurately translated for user clarity.
answers: Translating product category names to English

analyses.title: Seller Analysis
analyses.context: Investigate seller data to understand geographic and operational distribution of sellers.

sub_analyses.title: Seller Distribution by City
sub_analyses.why: To identify which cities have the highest concentration of sellers.
answers: Number of sellers in each city

sub_analyses.title: Seller Distribution by State
sub_analyses.why: To understand the spread of seller operations across different states.
answers: Number of sellers in each state

sub_analyses.title: Seller Geolocation Analysis
sub_analyses.why: To align seller locations with geographic coordinates, aiding in logistics mapping.
answers: Geographic coordinates for seller zip codes
